content: That's a great list of ideas! I think the photo challenges and sponsor interactions would be a lot of fun for our participants. For the charity-specific challenges, I like the idea of collecting pledges along the walk route. During our Pedal for a Purpose event, we collectively cycled a total distance of 300 kilometers, and I think a similar challenge could work well for our walkathon. Maybe we could challenge teams to collect a certain amount of pledges per kilometer walked?
